The source of the claim was traced to an: 2019, which reported the story with the headline 'Hotel cleaner who stole sperm from a used condom won child support battle.'
The article provided details about the a: stating that the hotel cleaner, named Jane, stole a used condom from a tech millionaire's hotel garbage can, inserted the semen inside her vagina, and became pregnant with a baby boy who is now 4-years-old.
During the child support hearing: Jane confessed that she never had sexual intercourse with the young millionaire and impregnated herself with his sperm while cleaning his room.
